title: PROJECT: Yasuo
body: Alright I find it amazing that all the other PROJECT skins are going to get a unique looking border but... will Yasuo be getting a border too?  I find it wrong to leave him out of it, since you know.. he's the 1ST PROJECT skin to ever come out.

replies.body: Riot Kateykhaos specifically said their will be no border for yasuo

> [{quoted}](name=Masked Lunatic,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=vE4oTaqI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-08T14:30:21.802+0000)
>
> Riot Kateykhaos specifically said their will be no border for yasuo

WHYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY?????

Because otherwise it'd be unfair to people who already have project yas (if they're gonna give it with a purchase). Or they'd have to give it to all project yas owners (that'd be a pain).

My opinion is to grant a border to the people who play project yas in the first week but it probably wont happen seeing as it's too late to make one for him. - kinda like the gp skin

Well, they can do it for the one who bought it as soon as it came out. And don't tell me it wouldn't be possible.
Yeah but they dont keep records of skin purchases beyond 90 days (and they state that beyond that limit they cannot refund etc).

> [{quoted}](name=Masked Lunatic,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=vE4oTaqI,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T15:10:53.845+0000)
>
> Yeah but they dont keep records of skin purchases beyond 90 days (and they state that beyond that limit they cannot refund etc).

Not giving refunds after 90 days and not keeping a sale history is something entirely different.

while they are different riot does not wish to deal with purchases beyond that point because it becomes far more work for something so minor (it also coincides with their work ethnic - why spend resources on something less productive when it can be diverted elsewhere).

> [{quoted}](name=Galen Marek,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=vE4oTaqI,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T15:07:01.294+0000)

> Well, they can do it for the one who bought it as soon as it came out. And don't tell me it wouldn't be possible.

Do you know how much people that would be for? with how long they usually take to distribute things you can bet people would complain here that they didnt receive it the moment it comes out.

it seems pretty reasonable why they didnt give it to Yasuo. you dont see people here complaining that past skin themes dont get special goodies when newer skin come out. Case in point older event skin like Harrowing, and Snowdown were normally just recolors (Leblanc,Zilean) now a days with skins like those they changed a whole bunch of things like auto attack animation, taunt, dance, etc, and they are usually all the same price.

With Yasuo you also have to remember that when people bought him they got him on sale so that basically means they would get a border for the least amount of RP since all newer skins will be at their normal price when they are first released. it wouldnt be fair!

alright. I'm going to be fair, here. I can see why he's not getting a first strike border, that's perfectly fine. But at the very least, I'd think he deserves an icon since those are completely seperate from anything to do with first strike stuff, and as the 1st and oldest project skin, I think he deserves atleast a little love with the release of his PROJECT comrades so he's not entirely excluded.

That's atleast my thoughts on the matter.
